name: Bullet Hell Exam
description:
Developed for #BulletHellJam2021.

Take an exam on the fundamentals of bullet hell shmups, consisting of five categories selected at random, each a maximum of 10 seconds. After the categories, you will be graded based on your performance in all five.

See what final grade you can get!

Controls:

  • Xbox Controller (Recommended): Just the Left Stick to Move and A to Select/Shoot
  • Keyboard: Either WASD or Directional keys to Move and Space to Shoot
